posts.post_content:
Selling my tobacco pack collection. Included are 20 different packs / boxes.
I am selling them as a complete lot and I am not breaking up at this time.
I will describe them as best as I could . 
Asking $2000.00 or B.O. plus $20.00 shipping
PP F&F or Money order.

Pirate cigarette full pack with all cigarettes and trade card included
Drum tobacco pouch (empty)
Honest Long cut tobacco pouch ( full with tobacco)
Recruit Little Cigars (yellow box) full with cigars.
Recruit Little Cigars  (beige box ) empty with writing on front of box
Sweet Caporal little cigars -empty box with writing on sides
Piedmont-empty pack with writing on side and back
Murad -empty pack
Sweet Caporal-empty pack
Helmar -empty pack
Melachrino- empty pack ( box coming apart)
Hassan -empty pack- small pc missing on slide
Puppies Cigarettes - 6 cigarettes inside
Phillip Morris -empty pack
John Player and sons-empty pack (5 count)
John Player and Sons empty pack (10 count)
Gallahers -empty pack
Gold Flake -Empty pack
Craven-empty pack
Wild Wordbine-empty pack.

Regards
John P
Do you have the date stickers? What years are ?hese.

I picked up these packs over many years .

John P
